answerText: The Night of the Iguana[10] The Night of the Iguana is by this playwright of The Glass Menagerie and A Streetcar Named Desire.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Illinois A + Dorman A + Wellesley | 12 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This play's characters include Hannah Jelkes, who is travelling with her old grandfather Nonno, a man who is working on his last poem, before his death. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this play about the defrocked Reverend T. Shannon, who has a "crack-up" while giving tours in Mexico.
